Welcome to Acid Labs and Kolorsheep Github Page!

Language Utilities

Want some Ruby gems? Or maybe a Symfony Bundle?. We don't want to do the same things over and over, so you better make it resuable. Feel free to use our stuff :).

Bootstrap Extensions

We love Bootstrap. We have build awesome extensions for it to help you make your web apps even faster!

Server Side

Having some pain with Chef or Capistrano? We already went through that hell, so use our recepies to configure your server and start deploying!

Language Utilities

puntopagos-ruby Ruby

Are you using Punto Pagos payment service in your Rails app? With these gem, you can easily interact with it's REST API.

puntopagos-sdk C#

Use this SDK to communicate with Punto Pagos REST API. Start receiving payments in a breeze.

rip Clojure

REST in Peace is a library for RESTful APIs built on top of compojure with some Korma utilities.

Bootstrap Extensions

Here at Acid Labs and Kolorsheep we're using Bootstrap a lot. It's an incredible tool to build rich and usable web apps fast. So we've been working in extensions to make Bootstrap more awesome, and it diserves it's own page. Go check it out!

Server Side

chef-rails server config

Kitchen to setup an Ubuntu Server ready to roll with Nginx and Rails.

capistrano-rails deployment

Capistrano recipes to deploy Rails applications with multistage support.
